mapper.sql: id, pic_name, create_time, update_time, creator, updator, monitor_rate_day, monitor_rate_week, monitor_rate_month, monitor_rate_year, open_task
mapper.insert: insert into sys_pic (id, pic_name, create_time, update_time, creator, updator, monitor_rate_day, monitor_rate_week, monitor_rate_month, monitor_rate_year, open_task, pic_url ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorRateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorRateWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorRateMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorRateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openTask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

id,
pic_name,
create_time,
update_time,
creator,
updator,

mapper.update:
update sys_pic
pic_name = #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monitor_rate_day = #{monitorRateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_rate_week = #{monitorRateWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_rate_month = #{monitorRateMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_rate_year = #{monitorRateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
open_task = #{openTask,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_pic set pic_name = #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitor_rate_day = #{monitorRateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_week = #{monitorRateWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_month = #{monitorRateMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_year = #{monitorRateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_task = #{openTask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_pic set pic_name = #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitor_rate_day = #{monitorRateDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_week = #{monitorRateWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_month = #{monitorRateMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_rate_year = #{monitorRateYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_task = #{openTask,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pic_name,(LENGTH(pic_url)-LENGTH(REPLACE(pic_url,',',''))+1) as pic_cnt,monitor_rate_day,open_task,update_time from sys_pic limit #{pagenum},#{limit};
select count(*) as count from sys_pic ;
